masthead: 科教文卫新闻·体育新闻

text.text: A:Oh,dear,I am lost.Er……　where is theShanghai Museum?
哎呀，糟糕，我迷路了。……上海博物馆在什么地方?
B:Sorry,I don't knowthe way either.I'm astranger here.Why don'tyou ask the traffic wardenover there?
对不起，我也不认得路。这儿我也不熟悉。你可以去问问那边的交通警察。
A:Thank you. Trafficwardens know the city well.
谢谢。交通警察对城市很熟悉。
